00019 // Process the stuff of the player when playing on the world map
00020 void CPlayer::processWorldMap()
00021 {
00022     inhibitwalking = false;
00023     inhibitfall = false;
00024  
00025     StatusBox();
00026  
00027     if(!hideplayer) ProcessInput();
00028     setWorldMapdir();
00029  
00030     if(!hideplayer && !beingteleported) Walking();
00031     WalkingAnimation();
00032 
00033     InertiaAndFriction_X();
00034     InertiaAndFriction_Y();
00035 
00036     performCollisions();
00037  
00038     selectFrameOnWorldMap();
00039 }
00040 
00041 // select proper player direction
00042 void CPlayer::setWorldMapdir()
00043 {
00044  bool exception=false;
00045  dpadcount = 0;
00046  if (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) { pdir = LEFT; dpadcount++; }
00047  if (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) { pdir = RIGHT; dpadcount++; }
00048  if (playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0) { pdir = UP; dpadcount++; }
00049  if (playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0) { pdir = DOWN; dpadcount++; }
00050  
00051  if ( pshowdir==UP && !playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0) exception = true;
00052  if ( pshowdir==DOWN && !playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0) exception = true;
00053  if ( pshowdir==LEFT && !playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) exception = true;
00054  if ( pshowdir==RIGHT && !playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) exception = true;
00055  
00056  if (playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0) pshowdir = UP;
00057  if (playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0) pshowdir = DOWN;
00058 
00059  if (dpadcount==1 || dpadlastcount==0 || exception)
00060   pshowdir = pdir;
00061 
00062  dpadlastcount = dpadcount;
00063 }
00064 
00065 // tell me, if the player tries to use an object on the map like entering the level
00066 int CPlayer::getNewObject()
00067 {
00068  int xb, yb;
00069  int lvl;
00070  
00071     if ( !object_chosen && (playcontrol[PA_JUMP] || playcontrol[PA_POGO]) )
00072     {   // trying to enter a level (or use a teleporter, etc)
00073      object_chosen = true;
00074   
00075         // get level/object marker beneath player
00076         xb = getXMidPos()>>STC;
00077         yb = getYMidPos()>>STC;
00078         lvl = mp_Map->getObjectat(xb>>4, yb>>4);
00079         if (!lvl)
00080         {
00081    yb = (getYPosition()>>CSF)+8;
00082    lvl = mp_Map->getObjectat(xb>>4, yb>>4);
00083         }
00084         return lvl;
00085     }
00086 
00087     if (!playcontrol[PA_JUMP] && !playcontrol[PA_POGO])
00088      object_chosen = false;
00089 
00090     return 0;
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool CPlayer::isWMSolid(int xb, int yb)
00094 {
00095  int level_coordinates;
00096 
00097  // Now check if the levels must block the player
00098  level_coordinates = mp_Map->getObjectat(xb>>CSF, yb>>CSF);
00099 
00100  if (level_coordinates & 0x8000)
00101  {
00102   if( mp_levels_completed[level_coordinates & 0x7fff] ) // check if level is done
00103      return false;
00104 
00105   if( (g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KTAB) && g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KSHIFT)) || godmode )
00106      return false;
00107   else
00108      return true;
00109  }
00110  return false;
00111 }
00112 
00113 void CPlayer::verifySolidLevels()
00114 {
00115  if(godmode) return;
00116 
00117  int x1 = getXLeftPos();
00118  int x2 = getXRightPos();
00119  int y1 = getYUpPos();
00120  int y2 = getYDownPos();
00121  int ymid = getYMidPos();
00122  int xmid = getXMidPos();
00123 
00124  if(isWMSolid(xmid,y1)) {
00125   moveDown(1);
00126   blockedu = true;
00127  }
00128  if(isWMSolid(xmid,y2)) {
00129   moveUp(1);
00130   blockedd = true;
00131  }
00132  if(isWMSolid(x1,ymid)) {
00133   moveRight(1);
00134   blockedl = true;
00135  }
00136  if(isWMSolid(x2,ymid)) {
00137   moveLeft(1);
00138   blockedr = true;
00139  }
00140 }
00141 
00142 void CPlayer::selectFrameOnWorldMap()
00143 {
00144     // select base frame for current direction
00145     if (pshowdir==RIGHT) sprite = playerbaseframe + PMAPRIGHTFRAME;
00146     else if (pshowdir==LEFT) sprite = playerbaseframe + PMAPLEFTFRAME;
00147     else if (pshowdir==UP) sprite = playerbaseframe + PMAPUPFRAME;
00148     else if (pshowdir==DOWN) sprite = playerbaseframe + PMAPDOWNFRAME;
00149 
00150     // add in walk frame if walking
00151     if (pwalking) sprite += pwalkframe;
00152 }

00154 // if nessie is at a mount point near the player, mounts him!
00155 void CPlayer::MountNessieIfAvailable()
00156 {
00157  // Look for the Nessie object
00158  std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = mp_object->begin();
00159  for(; obj != mp_object->end() ; obj++)
00160  {
00161   if((*obj)->m_type == OBJ_MESSIE)
00162   {
00163    CMessie &Messie = dynamic_cast<CMessie&>(**obj);
00164    Uint16 dist = 1<<CSF;
00165    Uint16 nessie_x, nessie_y;
00166 
00167    nessie_x = (*obj)->getXPosition();
00168    nessie_y = (*obj)->getYPosition();
00169 
00170    // Look if Nessie is nearby
00171    Uint32 x = getXPosition();
00172    Uint32 y = getYPosition();
00173    if( x >= nessie_x-dist+(*obj)->bboxX1 and x <= nessie_x+dist+(*obj)->bboxX2 )
00174    {
00175     if( y >= nessie_y-dist+(*obj)->bboxY1 and y <= nessie_y+dist+(*obj)->bboxY2 )
00176     {
00177      // Mount the Player
00178      Messie.mounted[m_index] = true;
00179               mounted = true;
00180               solid = false;
00181               beingteleported = true;
00182     }
00183    }
00184    break;
00185   }
00186  }
00187 
00188 }
00189 
00190 void CPlayer::UnmountNessie()
00191 {
00192  // Check if a NESSIE_LAND_OBJ is nearby the player. Only then he can unmount
00193  int dx, dy;
00194  int x = getXPosition()>>CSF;
00195  int y = getYPosition()>>CSF;
00196  for(dy=-1 ; dy <= 1 ; dy++)
00197  {
00198   for(dx=-1 ; dx <= 1 ; dx++)
00199   {
00200    // If NESSIE_LAND_OBJ was found, than put the player there!
00201    if(mp_Map->getObjectat(x+dx, y+dy) == NESSIE_LAND)
00202    {
00203     // Look for the Nessie object
00204     std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = mp_object->begin();
00205     for(; obj != mp_object->end() ; obj++)
00206     {
00207      if((*obj)->m_type == OBJ_MESSIE)
00208      {
00209       CMessie &Messie = dynamic_cast<CMessie&>(**obj);
00210       // Check if the there are no blocked tiles there!
00211       std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperty = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00212       CTileProperties &Tile = TileProperty[mp_Map->at(x+dx, y+dy)];
00213       if( !Tile.bdown and !Tile.bup and
00214        !Tile.bleft and !Tile.bright )
00215       {
00216        // unmount Messie
00217        Messie.mounted[m_index] = false;
00218        mounted = false;
00219        solid = godmode ? false : true;
00220        beingteleported = false;
00221        moveXDir(dx<<CSF);
00222        moveYDir(dy<<CSF);
00223        break;
00224       }
00225      }
00226     }
00227    }
00228   }
00229  }
00230 }
